name: Digital Lights
description:
Platforms
> Android, Windows

Website
> https://adakon.gitlab.io/website/game-digital-lights.html

Tags

> arcade, single player, gamepad support

Description:

You are digital light.
You use Red, Green and Blue light energy to shine.
Collect them until your light goes out.
Convert light energy and time to force energy to upgrade your skills and your surrounding.
Enjoy the 80s synthwave radio during your "journey".
